entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -23.4°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -27.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
